price: Ẹ fún àwọn obìnrin ní sọ̀daàkí wọn tó jẹ́ ọ̀ran-anyàn ní tọkàn-tọkàn. Tí wọ́n bá sì fi inú dídùn yọ̀ǹda kiní kan fún yín nínú rẹ̀, ẹ jẹ ẹ́ pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn àti ìgbádùn.
arabic: وَءَاتُواْ ٱلنِّسَآءَ صَدُقَٰتِهِنَّ نِحۡلَةٗۚ فَإِن طِبۡنَ لَكُمۡ عَن شَيۡءٖ مِّنۡهُ نَفۡسٗا فَكُلُوهُ هَنِيٓـٔٗا مَّرِيٓـٔٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waātū al-nisāa ṣaduqātihinna niḥ'latan fa-in ṭib'na lakum ʿan shayin min'hu nafsan fakulūhu hanīan marīan
